1.audio_path: C:\Users\aiden\Documents\TWU 23-24\Work\MARTA scripts\MARTA-2.0\In a bustling town called Jericho , there lived a rich man named Zacchaeus.wav

241.audio_path: C:\Users\aiden\Documents\TWU 23-24\Work\MARTA scripts\MARTA-2.0\He was a tax collector , but many disliked him for being greedy and unfair.wav

511.audio_path: C:\Users\aiden\Documents\TWU 23-24\Work\MARTA scripts\MARTA-2.0\One day , Zacchaeus heard about Jesus , a kind teacher visiting their town.wav

751.audio_path: C:\Users\aiden\Documents\TWU 23-24\Work\MARTA scripts\MARTA-2.0\Curious , Zacchaeus climbed a tree to see Jesus above the crowd.wav

961.audio_path: C:\Users\aiden\Documents\TWU 23-24\Work\MARTA scripts\MARTA-2.0\Jesus noticed him and surprised everyone by saying he would visit Zacchaeus ' house.wav

1261.audio_path: C:\Users\aiden\Documents\TWU 23-24\Work\MARTA scripts\MARTA-2.0\He promised to be honest and share his wealth with those in need.wav

1501.audio_path: C:\Users\aiden\Documents\TWU 23-24\Work\MARTA scripts\MARTA-2.0\Jesus praised Zacchaeus for changing his ways , showing that everyone can find forgiveness and start anew.wav
